title: Quantum Prison Adventure #68
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Quantum Cell Block
rooms.description: A sterile cell with walls that shimmer and phase in and out of existence. Blue quantum energy fields crackle along the ceiling. A metal bunk is bolted to the wall, and a storage locker hums with strange energy. Through the transparent force field door, you can see a corridor leading to the research lab.

items.name: metal bunk bed
items.description: A cold steel bunk with a thin mattress

items.name: smuggled note
items.description: A crumpled piece of paper hidden under the mattress
items.text: Prisoner log: They think we don't understand the quantum systems, but I've been watching. The storage locker code is based on Planck's constant: 6.626. Dr. Heisenberg runs this facility. The quantum core is in the lab.

items.name: quantum storage locker
items.description: A metal locker with a digital combination pad displaying three digits

items.name: prisoner's journal
items.description: A small notebook with observations about the prison
items.text: Day 47: The quantum entanglement device is the key to everything. Dr. Heisenberg keeps it locked in the lab safe. I overheard the guards - the escape pods are in the bay beyond the lab. We just need to get past the security systems.

items.name: security access card
items.description: A plastic card with a magnetic strip and quantum encryption chip

items.name: force field cell door
items.description: A shimmering energy barrier with a card reader mounted beside it

rooms.name: Quantum Research Laboratory
rooms.description: A high-tech laboratory filled with humming equipment and holographic displays showing quantum equations. Particle accelerators line the walls, and a large quantum computer core pulses with blue light in the center. Research terminals display classified data, and a heavy security door leads to the escape pod bay.

items.name: research terminal alpha
items.description: A computer terminal displaying quantum mechanics research
items.text: Research Log - Dr. Heisenberg: The quantum entanglement device allows instantaneous communication across any distance. Project codename: QUANTUM_CORE. Storage location: Lab safe, secured with facility protocols.

items.name: research terminal beta
items.description: A terminal showing prisoner containment data
items.text: Containment Report: All prisoners are held in superposition states until observation. Escape pod bay requires authorization. Security question protocols reference facility director, core project name, and quantum storage location.

items.name: quantum lab safe
items.description: A reinforced safe with quantum locks and biometric scanners

items.name: quantum entanglement device
items.description: A handheld device that glows with quantum energy, capable of unlocking quantum-secured systems

items.name: facility operations manual
items.description: A classified document detailing prison operations
items.text: CLASSIFIED: Quantum Prison Facility #68 - Director: Dr. Heisenberg. All quantum devices stored in lab safe. Project QUANTUM_CORE enables prisoner containment through probability manipulation. Emergency protocols require director authorization.

items.name: quantum computer core
items.description: A massive computer system processing quantum calculations

items.name: encrypted data chip
items.description: A small chip containing facility schematics and codes
items.text: Facility Schematic: Escape pod bay accessible via north corridor. Quantum entanglement device required for final security bypass. All systems monitored by central AI.

items.name: reinforced security door
items.description: A massive door with quantum encryption. A holographic panel displays three security questions.

password_questions.question: Who is the facility director?
password_questions.hint: Check the research terminals and facility manual

password_questions.question: What is the core project codename?
password_questions.hint: Look at the research logs on the terminals

password_questions.question: Where are quantum devices stored?
password_questions.hint: The facility manual mentions storage locations

rooms.name: Escape Pod Bay
rooms.description: You've made it to the escape pod bay! A sleek quantum-powered escape pod sits in its launch tube, humming with energy and ready for departure. Through the viewport, you can see the stars of deep space beckoning. Freedom is within reach. The pod's hatch stands open, waiting for you.

items.name: quantum escape pod
items.description: A state-of-the-art escape vessel with quantum drive engines, capable of faster-than-light travel

items.name: pod launch console
items.description: A control panel with launch sequence buttons glowing green and ready
items.text: LAUNCH SYSTEM READY - All systems nominal. Quantum drive charged. Destination: Nearest free colony. Press LAUNCH to initiate departure sequence.

items.name: observation viewport
items.description: A large window showing the vast expanse of space and distant stars

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You board the escape pod and initiate the launch sequence. The quantum drive engages with a brilliant flash of blue light, and the prison facility shrinks behind you as you accelerate to faster-than-light speeds. You've escaped Quantum Prison #68 and are heading toward freedom among the stars. You win!
